text:
Urbana, Illinois
April 30, 1945
Executive Committee
National association of
Educational Broadcasters
Gents:
I AM CALLING a SPECIAL MEETING OF THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE
for 10 aomÂ», Friday, May 3 in Boom i860 in the LaSalle Hotel.
Koom is the Illini Center. Telephone is Randolph 7750.
The meeting will be closed to all except Committee
MEMBERS AND MEMBERS OF NAE8.
Reasons for calling, and proposed business:
1. Consideration of proposed and possible finds of FCC
on FM allocation.
2. Consideration of NAEB participation in clear channel
hearing.
3. Consideration of possible national convention, or
A SERIES OF REGIONAL CONFERENCES.
4. Consideration of FREC problems,,
5. Consideration of AER relations.
6. Et al.
While opening meeting is scheduled for 10 a.m., we*ll
MEET THROUGHOUT THE OAY AS NEEDED.
ALL NAEB MEMBERS ARE CORDIALLY INVITED TO ATTEND. All
ARE URGED TO SUBMIT DATA, PROBLEMS, OPINIONS ON ANY OF THE
ABOVE TOPICS FOR CONSIDERATION OF THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE.
EXCEPTION - One or two experts have been invited to
SUBMIT PERTINENT DATA OR COMMENTS IN PERSON OR BY REPRESENTATION.
Your humble servant,
FESjmaj
Frank E0 Schooley
President
